metadata.synopsis: Kristeen Hazel, Refugee_11, wants to move to the city, and peferably without her mother in law

0.speaker: Kristeen Hazel
0.text: Gods! Camping with the mother-in-law has been utter hell. Maybe I should just go on ahead into the city without her. Scouting, like.

1.speaker: Kristeen Hazel
1.text: The old crone is watching me like a drunk eyes her bottle. I'll never ditch her at this rate.
